info.name: The Pirate Bay 2022 | Material Design - Update v7
info.description: Added a few simple animations, Material Design inspired by Google. removed the adult content checkbox
info.additionalInfo:
update v0.7
• added more proxies/links 
• removed yellow background and lock gif on search bar
• bug fixes

update v0.6
• fixed the landing page image

update v0.4
• added Roboto font to CSS

update v0.3
• removed underline when hover search items

update v0.2:
• fixed animation and depth of search bar shadow
• added and materialized search buttons (with animations)
• added animations and changed look of 'browse torrents' section
• materialized the drop-down menu in the list view

update v0.1:
• fixed font load time
• fixed bugs
